c: cost of broadcasting a unit-rate flow (one packet per unit time)
Gamma_{G^{\\prime}}: set of all triples of connected nodes on the expanded graph Gâ€²

title: Use of Lagrange multipliers
comments: not sure whether I should add c with index or not. Create facet for lagrangian density?
